Player History
Drafted in 16th round, 243rd overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/2015, off Takamasa Tokuhei (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/2015, off Dean Starling (ATL)...
Injured on 8/2/2015 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 9/17/2015 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
9/11/2016: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $3,530,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from San Francisco to Houston on 7/15/2018 (Going to SF: P Frank Ashley. Going to HOU: C Larry Davis, 3B Raimundo Rodriguez, LF Antonio Lera)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 3/1/2019 to a minor league contract.
